data.text: @ElfinBrown @BrexitBuster It's not so easy to bluff and bluster their way around the corruption now. The true scale of their involvement in the acceptance of Putin's cash, and the cost in lives, is now becoming clear. Tacit acceptance of a criminal regime has come with a horrendous cost in Ukraine.
@hopperpy @BrexitBuster He’s one of these flag shagger types and probably loves Johnson and Farage, yet too stupid realise those two are massive traitors to this country.
